Class LoginPage

java.lang.Object
LoginPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class LoginPage extends Object implements ActionListener
LoginPage class holds all information and methods of launch page It enables to login or sign in.
Author:
Emirhan Cakir

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginPage

      public LoginPage()
      LoginPage constructor prepare program to add elements. Basically it prepare to use methods and then calls start() function

  • Method Details

    • start

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      This method takes ActionEvent method and checks action. Different actions leads to different executions.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - e is ActionEvent object which enables to check source of action in this method.
